author: yogo
title: Easy Engagement - New Members - AIM
description: 新メンバー/メンターはカタリストをサポートしたいと思っているが、どのように関わるのがベストなのかを知るには時間がかかり、複雑である。

f6_assessments.q0:
アイデアは素晴らしく、課題と一致しています。新しい情報の量が急激に増加していることから、よく言われる問題が存在しているようです。経験や知識、専門性を既存の需要と結びつけるプラットフォームがあれば、コミュニティに参加する人やプロジェクトチームにメリットがあります。
ここで私が注目しているのは、カルダノコミュニティの中で、異なる（しかし時に似たような）目的のために、さまざまなプラットフォームが増えていることです。例えば、昨年のファンドでは、メンターとプロポーダーを結びつけるプラットフォームを作るという提案をいくつか見ることができました。ですから、F6（あるいはF5）からの資金提供された提案を調べて、どの提案が新しいプラットフォームを作ろうとしているかを見て、相乗効果をチェックし、場合によっては統合することをお勧めします。
理想的なのは、コミュニティ内のあらゆるニーズを結びつける、1つか2つの強力なプラットフォームを持つことです。そうすれば、これ以上情報が拡散するのを防ぎ、新規参入者のナビゲートにも役立ちます（まだ何を探しているのか分からないこともありますが）。  しかし、このような他のプラットフォームとの関わりが存在することを読んで、嬉しくなりました。

さらに、私はプラットフォームに次のようなものを含めることを提案します：ウェブと携帯電話のアプリのバージョン、タスクと専門性の標準化（例えば、標準化された分野で）、専門性を確認する方法（プラットフォームが行う）。
しかし、これらはほんの些細なこと（より運用的なこと）であり、提案に含まれていないのは理にかなっています。

さらに、このプラットフォームが将来的にどのように自己資金で運営していくのか、ここに書かれているといいと思います。メンバーがメンバーシップを支払う必要があるのか、追加機能が含まれているのか、などなど。もちろん、これはプロジェクト段階での市場調査の結果でしょうが、提案者が今から何を考えているのかを知ることで、現在考えられているビジネスモデルのヒントになると思います。

最後に、このプラットフォームによるカルダノコミュニティ内でのコミュニケーションプランを教えてください。このプラットフォームは、新規参入者と資金提供を受けた提案者をどのように結びつけ、関与させ、維持しようと考えているのか。どのようなチャンネルを使うのでしょうか？

全体として、非常に妥当でよくできた提案です。
f6_assessments.q1:
チームはすでに複数の知識分野でコミットし、経験を積んでおり、それが必要であり、プロジェクトの進展につながる。情報を確認するためのリンクがある（Likedinリンクなど）。

時間軸のしっかりした計画があり、非常に良いと思います。このプロジェクトはゼロからプラットフォームを開発しようとしていますが、PoCを行うのに時間はかからないので、コミュニティへの価値は（遅れがなければ）すぐに得られるだろうという点が特に高く評価されています。

妥当な予算の内訳はありますが、もっと詳細に記載しても良いと思います。例えば、「インフラおよびその他のプラットフォーム費用」には何が含まれているのか、「コミュニティおよび新規メンバー/アクセラレータ」が別の予算枠を持つのはなぜか、彼らはこの資金を受け取ることができるのか。ここで何を意味しているのか、はっきりしません。
しかし、私はこの点についてあまりペナルティを課さないし、フィジビリティー全体としては、やはり5つ星に値すると思う。
f6_assessments.q2:
KPIのセクションでは、目標値を含む優れた時間軸のKPIが設定され、「成功の測定方法」のセクションでは、優れたマイルストーンが設定されています。KPIは開発そのもの、マイルストーンは開発・実装に関連しており、このようなプロジェクトでは理にかなっており、すべての段階がカバーされ、監査可能であることを確認しています。

また、課題のセクションでは、優れたリスク分析が行われています。それらは基本的に、品質、コミュニケーション、オペレーションに関わるものです。私はここに、スケジュールや計画の遵守に関する課題を追加したいと思います。
提案としては、同じセクションに、これらの課題のそれぞれに対するリスク軽減戦略も入れておきます。これらは提案書の中で何らかの形で配分されていますが、ここにも（多少の繰り返しになるとしても）明確に記載されていると良いでしょう。

f6_assessments.q0: This seems like a great proposal to set up a platform to match mentors with funded proposals. The funding request is relatively small and the proposers have great experience. This would be a valuable addition to Catalyst.
f6_assessments.q1: This is a detailed proposal from a group with significant experience in the area. It seems highly likely they would be able to deliver on this proposal. It is great to see they have noted and are reaching out to related proposals.
f6_assessments.q2: They have a clear set of deliverables and timelines allowing auditing of progress. The proposal has outlined a clear set of KPI's and importantly have set goals against which success can be measured.

f6_assessments.q0: The plan is good, there are a ton of details here to dive into. Being able to bring in all sorts of people of the community and have them join up in groups is what is needed in this space to accelerate the building process! As a software developer myself, I am interested in this very much.
f6_assessments.q1: I appreciate all the information in regards to the team, their qualifications and other related information. Its all good to see and I wish other proposals provided this sort of detail as well!
f6_assessments.q2: The roadmap and milestones part is excellent. It does not leave me asking any questions which is a good thing. I can see the success with this one. The funding, the team, the process to get there, its all making sense.

f6_assessments.q0:
The success criteria are related to the challenge question. It will be very difficult and time consuming for new members/advisors to get support from the catalyst. This proposal aims to better connect new members and new networks (Business incubators/accelerators) to participate and take action in promoting sponsored proposals.
Create the right foundation between funding needs and member expertise. This proposal focuses on meeting the needs of funded projects with new members of the community
f6_assessments.q1:
I fully believe that with the solution and options presented here, there is a high probability that this proposal will be successfully implemented. This proponent's previous experience indicates a high probability that this project is live.
The proponent seems to have enough knowledge and experience to create content as good as he is suggesting. Offers provide complete information about the team, from the experiences the team has worked with to the members' profiles on LinkedIn. This shows the seriousness and openness of the author. Therefore, I believe that the team will have sufficient capacity to successfully implement this proposal.
The proponent reflects the potential challenges in many details and establishes a number of measures to avoid them.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proponent lays out a step-by-step plan for implementation with clear milestones, coherent KPI metrics, and defined timelines. Proposals know what they need to do, have a clear timeline with specific goals. The information provided is sufficient to fully assess the progress and success of the first three-month phase of the proposal. It's great that this proposal provides enough KPI data for us to test easily. Define clear measurable products that give us enough information to make progress
The stated budget is reasonable enough and it makes me completely agree that the team has enough capacity to tackle the challenge.

f6_assessments.q0: In this proposal the team presents a clear and concise description of the problem and offers an excellent solution. This proposal has a positive impact on the Cardano ecosystem and clearly articulates how it will add value to the Cardano ecosystem. KPIs match the ones indicated in the challenge and proposal is able to scale and address future challenges. Definitely a great idea!
f6_assessments.q1: The team is completely transparent! All the necessary experience and skills to deliver on the proposal are listed and the team provides evidence via links of relevant skills and experience, knowledge that is needed to realize this project. The team of three professionals is part of the Assembly Inspiring Masses, which gives even greater confidence in how the project will be realized. The budget is outlined clearly, understandable and it's broken down into identifiable items and it's reasonable to achieve the set goals. It might be good to present how many hours it takes to make each of the components of this project. The team does not require additional funds and a detailed implementing plan is professionally developed and presented. The team also presents well-developed details of actionable tasks and order of execution. The proposal has realistic time frames in which the work will be realized. The plan clearly shows the details of the actionable tasks and the order of execution, which is excellent, and the technical aspects such as architecture, language and technologies needed for the realization of this project are clearly explained. The  team does not cite the word risk but uses the term challenge. The team worked out very well the possible challenges that could happen.
f6_assessments.q2: The team is providing a roadmap with milestones and a time horizon and they are well presented and make sense as are the KPIs that define the success of the proposal. The KPIs provided can be used to quantify the success of the project and the community can track the progress of the project without any problems. Excellently prepared proposal!

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is about building a platform that matches between funded proposals needs and member expertise. This is a meaningful idea. The problem is clearly described, explained in detail, and fits this challenge. This solution is clearly defined showing the clear impact on the Cardano ecosystem in long term. Therefore, based on the given information, I strongly agree with this proposal's impact, I can rate it with a score of 5
f6_assessments.q1: This team consists of active members of the Catalyst, got a proposal funded in the prior fund [F4, F6], and their profile shows suitable skill and experiences for implementing this work. So I can see proof of feasibility from the team profile. The roadmap is clear with measurable KPIs. The budget is clear and logical. The risk is defined. Therefore, based on the given information, I strongly agree with this proposal's feasibility, I would rate it with a score of 5
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal provided a lot of information, with external links for verification. Therefore, based on the given information, I strongly agree with this proposal's auditability, I would rate it with a score of 5

f6_assessments.q0: * The proposal aims to solve a problem which is the base for success: Get the right people into the projects. Therefore it aligns very well with the challenge setting. All Catalyst (to be) funded teams are able to benefit from it, now and in the future. Having the right people in the team is the foundation to scale and become successful. I am dealing with this for +15 years on a daily base.
f6_assessments.q1: The team shows successful track record via linkedin profiles, short CVs, several previously funded projects and in-depth knowledge about Catalyst issues. The roadmap is comprehensive, broken down in weeks and looks realistic. The KPIs are elaborated in a very detailed way in a 3, 6, 12 month horizon. The plan describes the resources necessary to implement the proposal. The funding is broken down into understandable packages per role, but could also be a bit more detailed where they come from to justify the fee. The proposer even included potential challenges for a positive delivery.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal includes a roadmap with milestones and a reasonable time horizon for achievement. The success for this proposal (and the community) is measured in understandable and easy to measure KPIs. The proposers present a understandable solution that addresses a core problem of this challenge.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal addresses the key metrics of the challenge, and it has partnered with other proposers to tackle the problem it has identified from different angles.
f6_assessments.q1: the team is well versed in the catalyst process and has presented a clear implementation plan, however,  the team has not addressed how they will tackle the risks/challenges they expect to face in the project
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal includes a clear implementation plan, timeline and KPIs to allow tracking and auditing.

solution: 資金提供を受けた案件のニーズとメンバーの専門性をマッチングさせるプラットフォームです。
experience: 起業家、コネクター、メンター、開発者、アクティブなコミュニティメンバー、AIMチーム、CAs
